archdesc.bioghist: Professor of mathematics at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letter, July 2, 1869, sent to Martin B. Anderson and signed by Olney and other University of Michigan faculty urging Anderson to accept the presidency of the university; and second letter, July 2, 1869, of Olney to Anderson, about the same matter, and in which Olney warns of the danger of a Unitarian influence at the university as represented in the person of Charles H. Brigham; also photographs.
